title: Outcome of Conservative treatment of acute appendicitis in young females
details: EM Abdelrahman, HG Elgohary, AA Abdelaziz… - Benha Medical Journal, 2024
abstract: Introduction: Acute appendicitis is the commonest emergency in general surgery, the treatment of it is whether surgical or conservative. The aim of this study is to demonstrate the effects of conservative treatment Aim: evaluate the outcomes of …
